import { useState, useCallback } from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import { Button, Layout, Icon, Input, Avatar } from 'antd' const { Header, Content, Footer } = Layout export default ({ children }) => { const [search, setSearch] = useState(''); const handleSearchChange = useCallback((event) => { setSearch(event.target.value) }, [setSearch]) const handleOnSearch = useCallback(() => { }, []) return (
{children}
